org.jpws.data

Class Exchange

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpws.data.Exchange

  • public class Exchange
extends java.lang.Object
    Class describing various elements for communicating records and data fields of a database with a serializable text form for export and import features of the program. JDK1.6 OK

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Exchange.DataField
      This class represents a datafield of a database record in its generic plane.
      static class  Exchange.FieldSet
      Class to represent a set of DataField instances.
      static class  Exchange.RecordSet
      Class to represent a set of records, represented by their UUID.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Exchange()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Exchange.FieldSet allFields()
      Returns all exchangeable fields in a field set.
      static Exchange.FieldSet essentialFields()
      Returns a field set which is regarded to hold the essential fields.
      static java.lang.Object getFieldContent(org.jpws.pwslib.data.PwsRecord rec, Exchange.DataField field)
      Returns an object that represents the record content of the given field.
      static java.util.List<Exchange.DataField> getNormalizedFieldList(Exchange.FieldSet fields)
      Transforms an input field set into a list of fields, ordered to their ID values.
      static void setFieldContent(org.jpws.pwslib.data.PwsRecord record, Exchange.DataField field, java.lang.String value)
      Sets the content of a single field in the given PwsRecord.

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldContent

        public static java.lang.Object getFieldContent(org.jpws.pwslib.data.PwsRecord rec,
                                               Exchange.DataField field)
        Returns an object that represents the record content of the given field. These objects render their serializable content with the toString() method.
        Parameters:
        rec - PwsRecord
        field - DataField, describing a data element of the record
        Returns:
        Object or null if this field has no assignment

      • setFieldContent

        public static void setFieldContent(org.jpws.pwslib.data.PwsRecord record,
                                   Exchange.DataField field,
                                   java.lang.String value)
                            throws java.text.ParseException,
                                   org.jpws.pwslib.exception.InvalidPassphrasePolicy
        Sets the content of a single field in the given PwsRecord.
        Parameters:
        record - PwsRecord
        field - Exchange.DataField field identification object
        value - String, the textual representation of the field value as used in data exports
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
        org.jpws.pwslib.exception.InvalidPassphrasePolicy

      • getNormalizedFieldList

        public static java.util.List<Exchange.DataField> getNormalizedFieldList(Exchange.FieldSet fields)
        Transforms an input field set into a list of fields, ordered to their ID values.
        Parameters:
        fields - Exchange.FieldSet
        Returns:
        List<DataField>
